title: GIPHY Search Gets Glasses
description: Hey! My name is Bethany and I was a software engineering intern on the Search team this summer. I was also a 2017 hackNY fellow. I study computer science at the University of Pennsylvania. In this post, I discuss my internship project: leveraging optical character recognition (OCR) to help you find the perfect GIF. At [â€¦]

title: Jane Street Tech Talk, Verifying Network Data Planes
description: After a summer hiatus, the Jane Street Tech Talks series is back on for the fall! Last we left it, our very own Dominick LoBraico presented on the evolution of our internal configuration methodology and the systems that support it. For anybody that missed it, you can check out a recording of the talk on YouTube.
